works.description:
Treehugger legitematelly published an article on me and my ReCut series.
This has been re-written slightly which puts me in a not very good light, one picture has been reused. This content has then been reused again and again.

When you search for "recut furniture" you get the first 3 results that are proper, the rest is spam, you can see that just by the titles, they are all the same or similar, but the URL's are different.

Below is the search that shows the 7 pieces of ripped off content from Treehugger, it carries on page after page. I put the search in so you can easily see what I mean, there are dozens of links, I will paste one of the links in the location of infringing material box below for the formality of it.

http://www.google.co.uk/webhp?sourceid=chrome-instant&ie=UTF-8&ion=1#sclient=psy-ab&hl=en&site=webhp&q=recut%20furniture&oq=&aq=&aqi=&aql=&gs_l=&pbx=1&fp=ce3e8b1e30f3258&ion=1&bav=on.2,or.r_gc.r_pw.,cf.osb&biw=1920&bih=1075
